body:
Thanks for making an issue about this.  The underlying library needs fixing.

This is due to a change in the way logins are done for new mega accounts.

This is the corresponding change in the mega code
https://github.com/meganz/sdk/pull/1278

And here are some helpful discussions https://github.com/meganz/MEGAcmd/issues/121

I hope to have time to look at this at the weekend.

I can confirm it's currently impossible to use Mega.nz from within `rclone` on MacOS aswell:
```
$ rclone -vv lsd mega-gyunter:
2019/01/11 17:17:32 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.45" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "lsd" "mega-gyunter:"]
2019/01/11 17:17:32 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/gyunter/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2019/01/11 17:17:32 Failed to create file system for "mega-gyunter:": couldn't login: Unknown mega error -26
```

Upd.: I was able to log in after disabling 2FA.
Unfortunately, I have not found any note about it in official docs [here](https://rclone.org/mega/)

Same problem for me, but a different error message:
```
rclone -vv lsd mega:
2019/01/18 16:22:12 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.45" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "lsd" "mega:"]
2019/01/18 16:22:12 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/user/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2019/01/18 16:22:12 Failed to create file system for "mega:": couldn't login: The upload target URL you are trying to access has expired. Please request a fresh one
```
I didn't enable 2FA. The account in question was created yesterday.

It might be a good idea to include a note in the docs until this is fixed.

Same

`
Failed to create file system for "mega:": couldn't login: The upload target URL you are trying to access has expired. Please request a fresh one
`

I hope this bug will be fixed after all
Disabling 2FA did not fix this for me. I read something about MEGA changing it's APIs. I will look into fixing this tomorrow morning.

@c-edw I'd love to have some help with this!  I keep not having enough time :-(

Here is what I wrote above

> The underlying library needs fixing.
> 
> This is due to a change in the way logins are done for new mega accounts.
> 
> This is the corresponding change in the mega code
> [meganz/sdk#1278](https://github.com/meganz/sdk/pull/1278)
> 
> And here are some helpful discussions [meganz/MEGAcmd#121](https://github.com/meganz/MEGAcmd/issues/121)

Note it is likely that the fix will need to be in this library https://github.com/t3rm1n4l/go-mega (which I am also a maintainer of).

@c-edw wrote: 
> Sorry, I completely forgot. The issue seems to be with the `Login` function in go-mega (see [here](https://github.com/t3rm1n4l/go-mega/blob/854bf31d998b151cf5f94529c815bc4c67322949/mega.go#L461)). The computed `Handle` is different to what MEGA expects so the login fails and it throws EEXPIRED for some reason.
> I will try to reverse engineer the MEGA client JavaScript code a bit, but it's an absolute mess and isn't well documented.

Indeed!  I found the C++ SDK slightly easier to read but that might just be me...

https://github.com/meganz/sdk
I have one mega account that throws this error and another that works just fine one the very same machine...

> I have one mega account that throws this error and another that works just fine one the very same machine...

I think it is all mega accounts created after a certain date that have the problem.

https://github.com/ncw/rclone/issues/2771#issuecomment-453531051

If this info somehow useful: my account was created in 2013.
Ah, are there any good news?

Seems like this issue was [already reported on November 12th](https://forum.rclone.org/t/cannot-login-with-specific-user-on-mega/7557).

@ncw I think this limitation should be noted whereever Mega is listed as supported as otherwise users could be confused when trying out `rclone` for the first time. I ran into this myself and thankfully found this issue, but others might not be that lucky.

I've had a go at fixing this.  It works for my old account and a new one I created.

Please give this a go and report back - thanks!

https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.45-172-g7d5d6c04-fix-2771-mega-login-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

> I've had a go at fixing this. It works for my old account and a new one I created.
> 
> Please give this a go and report back - thanks!
> 
> https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.45-172-g7d5d6c04-fix-2771-mega-login-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

did not work on the windows x64 build. same error

```
2019/02/04 20:11:16 Failed to create file system for "mega2:": couldn't login: Object (typically, node or user) not found
```
